metadata.title: CVE-2024-35805 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: dmsnapshot: fix lockup in dm_exception_table_exit There was reported lockupwhen we exit a snapshot with many exceptions. Fix this by adding"cond_resched" to the loop that frees the exceptions.
